freenet.client
Class InsertContext

java.lang.Object
  freenet.client.InsertContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class InsertContext
extends Object
implements Cloneable

Context object for an insert operation, including both simple and multi-file inserts

Field Summary
 boolean canWriteClientCache
          Can this insert write to the client-cache? We don't store all requests in the client cache, in particular big stuff usually isn't written to it, to maximise its effectiveness.
 String compressorDescriptor
          a string that contains the codecs to use/try if the string is null it defaults to COMPRESSOR_TYPES.Values(), so old persistent inserts are not affected after update.
 int consecutiveRNFsCountAsSuccess
          On a very small network, any insert will RNF.
 boolean dontCompress
          If true, don't try to compress the data
 ClientEventProducer eventProducer
          Client events will be published to this, you can subscribe to them
 int extraInsertsSingleBlock
          Number of extra inserts for a single block inserted on its own.
 int extraInsertsSplitfileHeaderBlock
          Number of extra inserts for a block inserted above a splitfile.
 boolean forkOnCacheable
           
 int maxInsertRetries
          Maximum number of retries (after the initial attempt) for each block inserted.
 short splitfileAlgorithm
          Splitfile algorithm.
 int splitfileSegmentCheckBlocks
          Maximum number of check blocks per segment for splitfiles.
 int splitfileSegmentDataBlocks
          Maximum number of data blocks per segment for splitfiles

Field Detail

dontCompress

public boolean dontCompress
If true, don't try to compress the data

splitfileAlgorithm

public final short splitfileAlgorithm
Splitfile algorithm.

maxInsertRetries

public int maxInsertRetries
Maximum number of retries (after the initial attempt) for each block inserted. -1 = retry forever or until it succeeds (subject to consecutiveRNFsCountAsSuccess) or until a fatal error.

consecutiveRNFsCountAsSuccess

public final int consecutiveRNFsCountAsSuccess
On a very small network, any insert will RNF. Therefore we allow some number of RNFs to equal success.

splitfileSegmentDataBlocks

public final int splitfileSegmentDataBlocks
Maximum number of data blocks per segment for splitfiles

splitfileSegmentCheckBlocks

public final int splitfileSegmentCheckBlocks
Maximum number of check blocks per segment for splitfiles. Will be reduced proportionally if there are fewer data blocks.

eventProducer

public final ClientEventProducer eventProducer
Client events will be published to this, you can subscribe to them

canWriteClientCache

public boolean canWriteClientCache
Can this insert write to the client-cache? We don't store all requests in the client cache, in particular big stuff usually isn't written to it, to maximise its effectiveness. Plus, local inserts are not written to the client-cache by default for privacy reasons.

compressorDescriptor

public String compressorDescriptor
a string that contains the codecs to use/try if the string is null it defaults to COMPRESSOR_TYPES.Values(), so old persistent inserts are not affected after update.

See Also:
Compressor.COMPRESSOR_TYPES#getCompressorsArray(String compressordescriptor)

forkOnCacheable

public boolean forkOnCacheable

extraInsertsSingleBlock

public int extraInsertsSingleBlock
Number of extra inserts for a single block inserted on its own.

extraInsertsSplitfileHeaderBlock

public int extraInsertsSplitfileHeaderBlock
Number of extra inserts for a block inserted above a splitfile.
